overview_of_class: This course covers macroeconomics and monetary policy and the behavior of the economy as a whole, with an emphasis on the current economic crisis in the US and Europe. Topics include income, inflation, unemployment, and growth; consumption, investment, and rate of interest; monetary and fiscal policy. The class is lecture based, with a midterm and final. There will be weekly quizzes and homeworks.
name: Macroeconomics
subject: ECON
